sentences.sentence: Funnily enough, I met her only yesterday.
sentences.translation: 说来也巧，昨天我刚碰见了她。

sentences.sentence: Funnily enough, I said the same thing myself only yesterday.
sentences.translation: 奇怪的是，就在昨天我自己也说过同样的话。

sentences.sentence: Funnily enough I can remember what I had for lunch on July 5th, 1956, but I've forgotten what I had for breakfast today.
sentences.translation: 说来也怪，我能记得我1956年7月5日午餐吃的什么，却已忘了我今天早餐吃的什么。
